description: Extracts PO numbers and full appointment details (appointment_number, client, consignee, appointment_date_time, c3_response, po_numbers) from Monday.com C3 board updates. Supports Sobeys and Loblaw email formats.

capabilities.name: extract_c3_po_numbers
capabilities.description: Fetches the Updates (email body) for the given item_id(s), parses any table that has a 'Purchase Order Number' column, and returns all PO numbers per item.

item_ids.description: Multiple item IDs for batch results.

capabilities.name: extract_c3_appointment_details
capabilities.description: Fetches first N rows from C3 board where Row Type is empty; extracts appointment_number, client, consignee, appointment_date_time, c3_response, po_numbers from Sobeys or Loblaw emails.

author: Toolkit Author
